error_description: Omission of addressRepository.save(addressEntity) in save method causes addresses to not persist to database and returns null ID (development fault: accidental removal or omission of persistence call)
SQL injection vulnerability in getByUsername method via unsafe native query string concatenation '" + username + "' (human-made development fault: improper input sanitization)
Missing userRepository.delete(existingUserEntity) in delete method: logs deletion but leaves user in database (development fault: incomplete implementation)
